alert.note: Alert for Hampton, Poquoson; James City; Newport News; Surry; York (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 12 at 10:10PM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A LINE OF SHOWERS WILL AFFECT ISLE OF WIGHT...NORTHEASTERN SOUTHAMPTON...YORK...EAST CENTRAL SUSSEX...SOUTHEASTERN JAMES CITY... AND EASTERN SURRY COUNTIES...THE CITY OF POQUOSON...THE CENTRAL CITY OF SUFFOLK...THE CITY OF HAMPTON...THE CITY OF NEWPORT NEWS AND THE CITY OF WILLIAMSBURG... At 1009 PM EST, radar indicated showers were located along a line extending from near Sussex to near Downtown Suffolk. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. Winds in excess of 45 to 50 mph are possible with these showers. Locations impacted include... Newport News, Hampton, Williamsburg, Smithfield, Windsor, Wakefield, Surry, Langley AFB, Queens Lake, Virginia Institute For Marine Sciences, Hampton University, Christopher Newport University, Patrick Henry Field, Holland, Seaford, Gloucester Point, Suffolk, Isle Of Wight, Northampton, and Ivor. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these showers, and may cause localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Hampton, Poquoson; James City; Newport News; Surry; York
